title: 💵 1 Month Free! 💵 Beautiful Brand New 2 bed 2 bath
posting_body: 😊 This is in a beautiful new community that has done a fantastic job in creating a beautiful home experience.
Located equidistance to Downtown Austin, and Downtown San Marcos at 20 minutes each, enjoy both towns and easily commute.
Granite countertops in kitchen and bathrooms
☀️ Contemporary design and nice natural light
🖨️Resident co-working area with private and group work spaces
1 Month free self-prorated factored into listed price.
My service is 100% FREE for you!
